segments.text: Good morning ! I am Anna Lu . I've come for an interview which was arranged .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , I see . I am Jack White , Personnel Manager . Take a seat , please .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Glad to meet you , Mr . White .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Miss Lu , have you got any experience in restaurant service ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . Since I entered college , I have been working at a fast food restaurant as a part-time waitress .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Our restaurant receives a lot of foreign customers . Can you serve them in English ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's why I applied for this job . Now I am studying Hotel English in my college , and I am quite familiar with the western courtesy and restaurant etiquette . I am sure my public relation skills will leave a strong impression on your customers .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You must know our working hours are very long and overtime work is frequent .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think I will give you a 3 months â€™ trial . The salary for this period is 800 yuan a month with no bonus . After that period if we both feel satisfied , a formal contract would be signed .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: When am I supposed to start working ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Next monday . Bring your resume and diploma with you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I will . Thank you , Mr . White . Goodbye !
segments.speaker: S2
